subject: Basketball
Russian-Americans
lead_paragraph: As he acclimates to a new team, a new country and a new culture, the Knicks’ Timofey Mozgov is seeking familiarity where he can get it, and Brighton Beach provided it in generous doses.
snippet: As he acclimates to a new team, a new country and a new culture, the Knicks’ Timofey Mozgov is seeking familiarity where he can get it, and Brighton Beach provided it in generous doses.
